testsuite.name: SteganographyTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Task (hide, show, exit): > hide Input image file: > test/testimage.png Output image file: > test/out.png Input Image: test/testimage.png Output Image: test/out.png Image test/out.png.png is saved Task (hide, show, exit): > exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Task (hide, show, exit): > hide Input image file: > test/notexist.png Output image file: > test/out.png Input Image: test/notexist.png Output Image: test/out.png Can't read input file! Task (hide, show, exit): > exit Bye!
